Activity: Log in to the EHR system, check for any updates. Prepare for the day's tasks.
Conduct influenza symptom assessments for outpatient clinic patients. Document all findings in the EHR.
Administer vaccinations and ensure all documentation is complete. Verify patient records for accuracy.
Follow up with any patients who missed vaccinations earlier in the week. Update EHR accordingly.
Email @da-1 and @da-2 with any notable trends in influenza symptoms or vaccination rates.
Review and restock vaccination supplies. Ensure EHR is up to date for the week.
